title: Duplighost

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Minor Illusion**: At night, use any ability from another Koopa role.
- **Instant Trick** (1x): At day, use any day ability from another Koopa role.
- **Perfect Copy** (1x): Permanently transform yourself into another Koopa role you have a charge of.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have 1 charge of every single Koopa role, Using an ability will cost a charge of that role.
- You may not use abilities with 1 use or abilities from the King subalingment, you may only use abilities with 2 uses once.
- You don't have charges of Koopa King roles.

desc:
Post 1846
*They love to attack in disguise. It seems like they're generally stronger fighters when they're not disguised, though.*
